channel.title: Musicians block
channel.description: I'm out of ideas! What do I do?!

item.title: Musicians block
item.dc:creator: HELIXX
item.description:
Recently I’ve been stuck creatively and I haven’t been able to start anything new for a month and I was looking to see if anyone has any tips on getting ideas for songs.

Read full topic

item.title: Musicians block
item.dc:creator: bedlegs
item.description:
Try creating a track with something you usually don’t do first. If you usually do melody first, try drums first
If you usually sit, try standing. Try playing something live if you have a instrument.
Read a book
Anything inspire you other than music? Try that out. Remember it’s okay to take a break if you feel you need to! If you are in a creative rut you can always take the time to learn about music rather than create.

Read full topic

item.title: Musicians block
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
We literally responded at the same time with opposite advice. But @Vepium it’s all subjective. I say try both ways and then some to get things flowing. Whatever works will end up being the thing tatted works… yeah

Also @Eswyn has the most completely legitimate point so definitely do that too

Read full topic

item.title: Musicians block
item.dc:creator: Jax
item.description:
Of course though, this is what works for me. If this doesn’t work for you, then try to find out what has worked in the past and do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Musicians block
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
Dang callin me out like that right after I responded

Read full topic

item.title: Musicians block
item.dc:creator: Jax
item.description:
I get writers block all the time, but I always get out of it. I say just clear your mind, go on a bike ride, or something like that.
What doesn’t work for me is listening to other music. When I do that, I try to recreate the style and I always get frustrated and then get even more writers block.
To sum up, do something that isn’t music, and then you’ll be making music in no time! (Trust me )

Read full topic

item.title: Musicians block
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
Try listening to a new style and pushing yourself to learn it. That’s what I’ve done.

Read full topic

item.title: Musicians block
item.dc:creator: Eswyn
item.description:
Short answer and probably not the one you want: push yourself. Even if it sounds terrible, do it. Eventually, even if it takes hours, days, or weeks, something will click. It takes time and persistence.

Read full topic
